title: MMR
body: I tried to to an estimate of my MMR using OP.GG and quickfind.kassad.in but it couldn't tell me my MMR does anyone know any other ways of finding MMR

replies.body:
MMR is a hidden value in League. There's no legal way of accessing it. Doing so probably breaks the EULA and could get your account banned.

Any service that claims to provide your MMR is usually just an advanced estimating algorhithm which looks purely at the divisions of the players you've been matched with in the last ten games you've had, and using the average known MMR for those divisions, averages them out and gives you an estimate.

But usually those services work. Have you tried Lolking?
